Inspiration & Motivation.quote: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Inspiration & Motivation.author: Walt Disney

Inspiration & Motivation.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Inspiration & Motivation.author: Sam Levenson

Inspiration & Motivation.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
Inspiration & Motivation.author: Winston S. Churchill

Success.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Success.author: Henry David Thoreau

Success.quote: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Success.author: John D. Rockefeller

Success.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston S. Churchill

Wisdom & Knowledge.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
Wisdom & Knowledge.author: Aristotle

Wisdom & Knowledge.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
Wisdom & Knowledge.author: Socrates

Wisdom & Knowledge.quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste much of it.
Wisdom & Knowledge.author: Seneca

Communication.quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
Communication.author: Plato

Communication.quote: The most important thing in communication is hearing what isn't said.
Communication.author: Peter Drucker

Communication.quote: Words are, of course, the most powerful drug used by mankind.
Communication.author: Rudyard Kipling

Love.quote: Where there is love there is life.
Love.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Love.quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls...
Love.author: Maya Angelou

Love.quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
Love.author: Eden Ahbez

Mindfulness & Peace.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
Mindfulness & Peace.author: Buddha

Mindfulness & Peace.quote: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
Mindfulness & Peace.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

Mindfulness & Peace.quote: Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you.
Mindfulness & Peace.author: Anne Lamott
